name: Time Sweeper (Matthew Lawrence)
description:
Work alone or against a friend to rack up points! Pick up cogwheels to add time, but watch out for the clock hands. After one minute runs out, it's game over!

Player 1: WASD and Space Player 2: Arrow Keys and Right Shift

Made for VGDC Winter 2020 Game Jam in 24 hours.

Theme: Time

Programming by Alvin Wong and Brandon Foey Art by Matthew Lawrence
